name: ProfilesExtended
author: kafeijao
description:
This mod adds functionality to avatar parameter profiles system.

__**Features**__
- Exclude parameters from changing by including `*` in their AAS name
- Exclude parameters not present in the AAS from loading via profiles
- Bypass the exclusion by including `*` in the profile name
- Remember **current** parameters across avatar changes or game restarts

__**Config**__
- Whether to exclude or not parameters not in AAS on profile load. **default:** `true`
- Define which tags are used. **default**: `*`
- Remember current parameters across av. changes/game restarts. **default**: `true`
- Name of profile used to remember parameters. **default**: `Auto`

Refer to the [IN-DEPTH](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/ProfilesExtended) documentation for more information.
changelog: - Fixed AAS for Joystick2D, Joystick3D, and Color not saving/loading
